import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { AuthService } from '../services/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-register', templateUrl: './register.component.html', styleUrls: ['./register.component.css'] }) export class RegisterComponent { registrationForm!: FormGroup constructor(private authService: AuthService, private fb:FormBuilder){ this.registrationForm = this.fb.group({ first_name: ['', [Validators.required]], last_name: ['', [Validators.required]], password: ['', [Validators.required]], confirm_password: ['', [Validators.required]], }) } createUser(){ console.log(this.registrationForm); } }
